results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into chaos.

results.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
results.overview: Peter Parker faces multiversal consequences after his identity is revealed.

results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: The life journey of a simple man with a big heart who influences historical events.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: A computer hacker learns the true nature of reality and his role in the war against machines.

results.title: Gladiator
results.overview: A former Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

results.title: Avengers: Endgame
results.overview: The Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore balance.

results.title: 3 Idiots
results.overview: Three friends navigate college life while challenging the pressures of the education system.

results.title: Titanic
results.overview: A young aristocrat falls in love with a poor artist aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

results.title: Joker
results.overview: A failed comedian descends into madness and becomes Gotham City's infamous criminal.

results.title: Parasite
results.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between two families.

results.title: Whiplash
results.overview: A promising drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory led by an abusive instructor.

results.title: La La Land
results.overview: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

results.title: Blade Runner 2049
results.overview: A young blade runner discovers a secret that leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

results.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
results.overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to flee a tyrant.

results.title: The Social Network
results.overview: The story of the founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.

results.title: Django Unchained
results.overview: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

results.title: Se7en
results.overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

results.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
results.overview: The rise and fall of a stockbroker living a life of excess.

results.title: Oppenheimer
results.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.
